Title: Relates to establishing a temporary toll holiday for use of the thruway
Summary: Establishes a temporary toll holiday for use of the thruway from June 1, 2024 through August 31, 2024.
LawCode: Add ยง390, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to establishing a temporary toll holiday for use of the thruway
